name: BLUTSAUGER
description:
People who worked on the game:

Michael Guattery: Designer, Programmer

https://guattery.itch.io/

Rachel Theil: Designer, Programmer

https://teal-ish.itch.io/

Liam McAlinden: Designer, Artist

https://liammcalinden.itch.io/

Made for the TOJam13 Flirteen with Danger.

Theme for the jam was Winning is Losing.

In BLUTSAUGER you must survive for as long as you can. Dash through enemies or eat their corpses to steal life from them!

Your only weapon is your own blood. Be careful with it or you might succumb to blood loss!

Good luck!!!!
